amendment.description: To improve Federal contracting and procurement by eliminating fraud and abuse and improving competition in contracting and procurement and by enhancing administration of Federal contracting personnel.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 4230 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 43. Record Vote Number: 169.
Motion to table amendment SA 4230 made in Senate.

Amendment SA 4230 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S5845-5847, S5852, S5854-5857, S5861) To improve Federal contracting and procurement by eliminating fraud and abuse and improving competition in contracting and procurement and by enhancing administration of Federal contracting personnel.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4230 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 4230 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 43. Record Vote Number: 169.
